TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit GetFolderType extends ExchangeWebServices.BaseRequestType

summary.span: 类表示邮箱中获取文件夹的请求。

span.span: The class represents a request to get folders from a mailbox.

span.para: GetFolder 操作来获取常规、 管理和默认文件夹从 Exchange 邮箱。
The GetFolder operation is used to get regular, managed, and default folders from an Exchange mailbox.
下面的示例演示如何获取两个文件夹。由文件夹 Id 属性标识的一个文件夹，并由 DistinguishedFolderId 属性标识其他文件夹。响应将包含定义 AllProperties 响应形状和如果它适用于该文件夹的 ManagedFolderInformation 属性提供的附加信息的属性。

The following example shows you how to get two folders. One of the folders is identified by the FolderId property and the other folder is identified by the DistinguishedFolderId property. The response will contain the properties that are defined for the AllProperties response shape and the additional information that is provided by the ManagedFolderInformation property if it applies to the folder.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 构造函数初始化的新实例类。

span.span: The constructor initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <ExchangeWebServices::BaseFolderIdType ^> ^ FolderIds { cli::array <ExchangeWebServices::BaseFolderIdType ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <ExchangeWebServices::BaseFolderIdType ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 属性获取或设置要获取的文件夹的标识符。

span.span: The property gets or sets the identifiers of the folders to get.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property ExchangeWebServices::FolderResponseShapeType ^ FolderShape { ExchangeWebServices::FolderResponseShapeType ^ get(); void set(ExchangeWebServices::FolderResponseShapeType ^ value); };

summary.span: 属性获取或设置要在响应中返回的属性。

span.span: The property gets or sets the properties to be returned in the response.
